full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Maintenance Inspections of Seventeen Communications Towers**

**Reference**: PW-22-01009687

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites vendors to submit proposals for maintenance inspections of seventeen (17) Government of Canada communications towers located throughout Manitoba. The contract period will be from the date of contract award to March 31, 2023.

**Security Requirements**:
The contractor is required to have all personnel working on site security cleared at the level of Facility Access with Escort, as verified by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Personnel Security Unit (PSU).

**Selection Criteria**:
A bid must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Submission Details**:
Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Request for Proposal. Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

**Tender Documents**:
The Following documents are available for download at [Canada Buy and Sell](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities):

1. Request for Proposal
2. Appendices A to E
3. Integrity Regime and Verification Forms

**Important Note**:
Canada is not responsible for any information found on third-party websites. Bidders are responsible for regularly consulting the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information.

**Contact Information**:
Shawn M. Balaski
Bid Receiving Unit
6101 Dewdney Ave, Regina, SK S4P 3K7
Phone: 780-670-8592
Email: shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
